title: Advertisement, "Paper is part of the CORPORATE picture", n.d.
markings: Holly berry and embossed leaves, lower left corner (Strathmore logo?)
signed: Signature imprinted lower center: Paul Rand
inscribed: Recto: imprinted in black ink, lower right: Paper is part of the CORPORATE picture; Verso: imprinted in black, center, on chartreuse rectangle in three text blocks.  First text block: Stock Option?/ Exercise your creative option to the fullest:/ Specify Beau Brilliant./ You will get an interest-bearing surface,/ texture that pays a dividend in distinction,/ a diversified portfolio of rich colors. Underneath in second text block: Beau Brilliant by Strathmore:/ The Expert's option when fine paper/ is specified for key corporate communications/ such as the presentation folder,/ the announcement or special brochure,/ the annual report.  Underneath in third text block: This insert was printed by offset lithography/ on Strathmore Beau Brilliant, Palm Beach/ White, cover basis 65. Other colors include: Bar/ Harbor Gray, Brighton Beige, Del Monte/ Red, Granada Purple, Lido Yellow, Mentone/ Ivory, Riviera Rose, Sarasota Green, Seabright/ Blue, Newport Blue and Tampico Brown.  Imprinted in lower center: Strathmore Paper Company West Springfield, Massachusetts; lower right corner: 133M-863-175 PRINTED IN USA
description: Double sided promotional sheet for the Strathmore paper company.  Recto: a vertical triangle in white squared to resemble graph paper, on which is printed a zig zag black line and dot to resemble a profile of a smiling face.  The rectangle is shaded on upper and left edges to convey that it is set behind a wide chartreuse frame.  Title in black lower right.  Verso: chartreuse rectangle casts gray shadow along right and lower edges.  2 text blocks in black promote the strathmore paper company and its products.  Company name and location lower center.
